steps.title: Fold paper diagonally
steps.description: BEFORE: A square sheet of paper is flat on the table. ACTION: Fold the paper diagonally to form a triangle. AFTER: A triangle shape is formed. FAILURE: The edges do not align perfectly.

steps.title: Fold corners to center
steps.description: BEFORE: A triangle shape is on the table. ACTION: Fold the two corners of the triangle to the center line. AFTER: A kite shape is formed. FAILURE: The corners do not meet at the center line.

steps.title: Fold top point down
steps.description: BEFORE: A kite shape is on the table. ACTION: Fold the top point of the kite down to the bottom point. AFTER: A diamond shape is formed. FAILURE: The top point does not align with the bottom point.

steps.title: Fold sides to center
steps.description: BEFORE: A diamond shape is on the table. ACTION: Fold the sides of the diamond to the center line. AFTER: A narrow kite shape is formed. FAILURE: The sides do not align with the center line.

steps.title: Fold bottom point up
steps.description: BEFORE: A narrow kite shape is on the table. ACTION: Fold the bottom point up to the top point. AFTER: A smaller diamond shape is formed. FAILURE: The bottom point does not align with the top point.

steps.title: Create head by folding
steps.description: BEFORE: A smaller diamond shape is on the table. ACTION: Fold the top point down to create a head shape. AFTER: A head shape is formed on the top. FAILURE: The head shape is not distinct.

steps.title: Form the neck
steps.description: BEFORE: A head shape is on top of the paper. ACTION: Fold the paper to form a neck shape. AFTER: A neck shape is visible. FAILURE: The neck is not properly aligned.

steps.title: Adjust the head
steps.description: BEFORE: A neck shape is visible. ACTION: Adjust the head to make it more distinct. AFTER: A distinct head shape is formed. FAILURE: The head is not distinct or aligned.

steps.title: Complete the swan
steps.description: BEFORE: A swan shape is almost complete. ACTION: Make final adjustments to the swan shape. AFTER: A complete swan shape is visible. FAILURE: The swan shape is not symmetrical.

steps.title: Hold the light bulb
steps.description: BEFORE: The hand is not holding the light bulb. ACTION: The hand is holding the light bulb. AFTER: The hand is holding the light bulb. FAILURE: The hand is not holding the light bulb.

steps.title: Remove the glass cover
steps.description: BEFORE: The glass cover is still on the light bulb. ACTION: The glass cover is being removed. AFTER: The glass cover is off the light bulb. FAILURE: The glass cover is still on the light bulb.

steps.title: Remove the metal cover
steps.description: BEFORE: The metal cover is still on the light bulb. ACTION: The metal cover is being removed. AFTER: The metal cover is off the light bulb. FAILURE: The metal cover is still on the light bulb.

steps.title: Remove the light bulb
steps.description: BEFORE: The light bulb is still in the socket. ACTION: The light bulb is being removed. AFTER: The light bulb is out of the socket. FAILURE: The light bulb is still in the socket.

steps.title: Remove the glass cover
steps.description: BEFORE: The glass cover is still on the light bulb. ACTION: The glass cover is being removed. AFTER: The glass cover is off the light bulb. FAILURE: The glass cover is still on the light bulb.

steps.title: Remove the metal cover
steps.description: BEFORE: The metal cover is still on the light bulb. ACTION: The metal cover is being removed. AFTER: The metal cover is off the light bulb. FAILURE: The metal cover is still on the light bulb.

steps.title: Remove the light bulb
steps.description: BEFORE: The light bulb is still in the socket. ACTION: The light bulb is being removed. AFTER: The light bulb is out of the socket. FAILURE: The light bulb is still in the socket.

steps.title: Remove the glass cover
steps.description: BEFORE: The glass cover is still on the light bulb. ACTION: The glass cover is being removed. AFTER: The glass cover is off the light bulb. FAILURE: The glass cover is still on the light bulb.

steps.title: Remove the metal cover
steps.description: BEFORE: The metal cover is still on the light bulb. ACTION: The metal cover is being removed. AFTER: The metal cover is off the light bulb. FAILURE: The metal cover is still on the light bulb.

steps.title: Remove screws from the light cover
steps.description: BEFORE: Light cover with screws visible. ACTION: Unscrewing the screws from the cover. AFTER: Screws are removed and set aside. FAILURE: Screws are not fully removed or stripped.

steps.title: Detach the light cover
steps.description: BEFORE: Light cover is unscrewed but still attached. ACTION: Lifting the cover off the base. AFTER: Cover is completely detached. FAILURE: Cover is stuck or not fully removed.

steps.title: Disconnect wires from the base
steps.description: BEFORE: Wires connected to the base. ACTION: Detaching the wires from the base. AFTER: Wires are completely disconnected. FAILURE: Wires are still attached or damaged.

steps.title: Reattach the light cover
steps.description: BEFORE: Light cover is detached. ACTION: Placing the cover back onto the base. AFTER: Cover is aligned and ready to be secured. FAILURE: Cover is misaligned or not sitting properly.

steps.title: Secure the light cover with screws
steps.description: BEFORE: Light cover is positioned on the base. ACTION: Screwing the cover back onto the base. AFTER: Cover is securely attached. FAILURE: Screws are loose or not fully tightened.

steps.title: Position the light
steps.description:
**Goal:** Prepare the light for disassembly
**Action:** Hold the light in both hands
**Mistakes:** Not securing the light properly
steps.instruction: Hold the light firmly with both hands.

steps.title: Remove screws
steps.description:
**Goal:** Open the light casing
**Tools:** screwdriver
**Action:** Use a screwdriver to remove screws
**Mistakes:** Using the wrong screwdriver size; Stripping the screws
steps.instruction: Use the screwdriver to remove the screws from the casing.

steps.title: Separate casing
steps.description:
**Goal:** Access the internal components
**Action:** Pull apart the light casing
**Mistakes:** Forcing the casing open; Damaging the casing
steps.instruction: Gently pull apart the light casing.

steps.title: Remove bulb
steps.description:
**Goal:** Take out the bulb for replacement
**Action:** Carefully remove the bulb from the socket
**Mistakes:** Breaking the bulb; Touching the bulb with bare hands
steps.instruction: Carefully remove the bulb from the socket.

steps.title: Insert new bulb
steps.description:
**Goal:** Replace the old bulb with a new one
**Action:** Insert the new bulb into the socket
**Mistakes:** Not securing the bulb properly; Touching the bulb with bare hands
steps.instruction: Insert the new bulb into the socket.

steps.title: Reassemble casing
steps.description:
**Goal:** Close the light casing
**Action:** Align and press the casing halves together
**Mistakes:** Misaligning the casing; Forcing the casing closed
steps.instruction: Align and press the casing halves together.

steps.title: Secure screws
steps.description:
**Goal:** Ensure the casing is tightly closed
**Tools:** screwdriver
**Action:** Use a screwdriver to tighten the screws
**Mistakes:** Over-tightening screws; Using the wrong screwdriver size
steps.instruction: Use the screwdriver to tighten the screws.

steps.title: Position the light
steps.description:
**Goal:** Prepare the light for disassembly
**Action:** Hold the light with both hands
**Mistakes:** Not holding the light securely
steps.instruction: Hold the light firmly with both hands

steps.title: Unscrew the light cover
steps.description:
**Goal:** Remove the cover from the light
**Tools:** screwdriver
**Action:** Use a screwdriver to remove screws
**Mistakes:** Using the wrong screwdriver size; Stripping the screws
steps.instruction: Use the screwdriver to remove the screws from the cover

steps.title: Remove the light cover
steps.description:
**Goal:** Access the internal components
**Action:** Lift the cover off the light
**Mistakes:** Forgetting to remove all screws; Forcing the cover off
steps.instruction: Gently lift the cover off the light

steps.title: Disconnect the bulb
steps.description:
**Goal:** Remove the bulb from the socket
**Action:** Twist and pull the bulb out
**Mistakes:** Breaking the bulb; Not twisting before pulling
steps.instruction: Twist and pull the bulb out of the socket

steps.title: Insert the new bulb
steps.description:
**Goal:** Replace the old bulb with a new one
**Action:** Align and insert the new bulb
**Mistakes:** Not aligning the bulb correctly; Forcing the bulb into the socket
steps.instruction: Align and insert the new bulb into the socket

steps.title: Reattach the light cover
steps.description:
**Goal:** Secure the cover back onto the light
**Action:** Place the cover back onto the light
**Mistakes:** Not aligning the cover correctly; Forgetting to secure the cover
steps.instruction: Place the cover back onto the light

steps.title: Screw the cover back on
steps.description:
**Goal:** Secure the cover with screws
**Tools:** screwdriver
**Action:** Use a screwdriver to tighten screws
**Mistakes:** Over-tightening screws; Using the wrong screwdriver size
steps.instruction: Use the screwdriver to tighten the screws on the cover

steps.title: Position the light
steps.description:
### Goal
Prepare the light for disassembly.

### Action
Hold the light firmly with both hands.

### Common Mistakes
- Not securing the light properly, leading to slipping.
steps.instruction: Hold the light firmly with both hands.

steps.title: Remove the screws
steps.description:
### Goal
Open the light casing by unscrewing.

### Action
Use a screwdriver to rotate the screws counterclockwise.

### Tools
- screwdriver

### Common Mistakes
- Using the wrong screwdriver size.
- Turning the screws the wrong way.
steps.instruction: Use the screwdriver to unscrew the screws counterclockwise.

steps.title: Separate the casing
steps.description:
### Goal
Access the internal components of the light.

### Action
Gently pull apart the casing halves.

### Common Mistakes
- Forcing the casing, which may cause damage.
steps.instruction: Gently pull apart the casing halves.

steps.title: Remove the bulb
steps.description:
### Goal
Take out the bulb for replacement or inspection.

### Action
Carefully lift the bulb out of its socket.

### Common Mistakes
- Touching the bulb with bare hands, which can leave oil residues.
steps.instruction: Carefully lift the bulb out of its socket.

steps.title: Insert new bulb
steps.description:
### Goal
Place a new bulb into the socket.

### Action
Align the new bulb and gently press it into the socket.

### Common Mistakes
- Not aligning the bulb correctly, leading to improper seating.
steps.instruction: Align the new bulb and gently press it into the socket.

steps.title: Reassemble the casing
steps.description:
### Goal
Close the light casing securely.

### Action
Fit the casing halves together.

### Common Mistakes
- Not aligning the casing properly, causing gaps.
steps.instruction: Fit the casing halves together.

steps.title: Secure the screws
steps.description:
### Goal
Tighten the screws to secure the casing.

### Action
Use a screwdriver to rotate the screws clockwise.

### Tools
- screwdriver

### Common Mistakes
- Over-tightening the screws, which can strip the threads.
steps.instruction: Use the screwdriver to tighten the screws clockwise.

steps.title: Position the light fixture
steps.description:
### Goal
Prepare the light fixture for disassembly.

### Action
Hold the light fixture steady on the table.

### Common Mistakes
- Not holding the fixture securely, causing it to move.
steps.instruction: Hold the light fixture steady on the table.

steps.title: Remove the screws
steps.description:
### Goal
Open the light fixture by removing screws.

### Action
Use a screwdriver to unscrew the screws from the fixture.

### Tools
- screwdriver

### Common Mistakes
- Using the wrong screwdriver size.
- Stripping the screws.
steps.instruction: Unscrew the screws from the fixture using the screwdriver.

steps.title: Separate the fixture cover
steps.description:
### Goal
Access the internal components of the light fixture.

### Action
Gently lift and separate the cover from the fixture.

### Common Mistakes
- Forcing the cover and damaging it.
steps.instruction: Gently lift the cover off the fixture.

steps.title: Remove the bulb
steps.description:
### Goal
Take out the bulb from the fixture.

### Action
Carefully twist and pull the bulb out of its socket.

### Common Mistakes
- Breaking the bulb by applying too much force.
steps.instruction: Twist and pull the bulb out of its socket.

steps.title: Inspect the socket
steps.description:
### Goal
Check the socket for any damage or debris.

### Action
Visually inspect the socket for any visible issues.

### Common Mistakes
- Not noticing small debris or damage.
steps.instruction: Inspect the socket for any damage or debris.

steps.title: Reassemble the fixture
steps.description:
### Goal
Put the light fixture back together.

### Action
Align the cover and secure it with screws using a screwdriver.

### Tools
- screwdriver

### Common Mistakes
- Misaligning the cover.
- Over-tightening the screws.
steps.instruction: Align the cover and secure it with screws.
